Basic built-in terminal commands

Command Description
cd Move around your directory structure
mkdir Create directories
touch Create files
cp Copy files
mv Move files
rm Delete files


Alias Shell Command


1. Alias 'rm'

This alias is to avoid permanently deleting files.

  alias rm = "trash"

2. Alias 'cl'

This alias is to clean the terminal interface temporaly.

  alias cl = "clear"
